# VOXLO Project Setup Progress

## Project Overview
Real-time encrypted chat platform with invite-only access, local storage, and auto-expiring messages.

## Setup Checklist

- [x] Create copilot-instructions.md file
- [ ] Scaffold the Project
- [ ] Customize the Project
- [ ] Install Required Extensions
- [ ] Compile the Project
- [ ] Create and Run Task
- [ ] Launch the Project
- [ ] Ensure Documentation is Complete

## Project Requirements
- Frontend: React with Vite
- Backend: Node.js with Express and Socket.io
- Invite code system (6 alphanumeric digits)
- Local storage for chat data
- Auto-delete messages after 10 minutes
- Deploy on Render
- Push to GitHub
